text:
Created attachment 1597
new Workbook.patch , please use it

Just a quick note on submitting patches in the future.  Submitting them 
archived up as one file (a tar or zip) would make it easier to deal with.  
Thanks.
creator: glens@apache.org
romal@vistaportal.com
text:
Created attachment 1610
new HSSFName , fixed a bug with setSheetName, please use it

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
I've started trying to integrate this patch, but I do have some issues.  I need
a commitment from the supplier to supply Javadoc, improve the function names
(some of them are utterly meaningless) and conform to the rules set by our
community.  http://jakarta.apache.org/poi/resolutions/res001.html -- I realize
this patch being applied is very important to you.  I need you to demonstrate
that by agreeing to bring this up to spec.  Please don't think we're just
arrogant pricks, its just the project health is 100 times more important to us
than any 1 feature.  I await your response. -Andy

creator: romal@vistaportal.com
text:
Created attachment 1647
Fixed Ptg Records

Created attachment 1649
New Patch for ptgs and RangeAddress
creator: romal@vistaportal.com
poi-support@buni.org
text: what kind of file is the latest attachment?

creator: romal@vistaportal.com
text: Its rar

not to be difficult but I simply don't have rar...and I don't think they even
make it for linux.  Can you submit it again in
tar/tar.gz/gzip/bzip2/zip/arj/macpack format?  I can do any of those. 
(preferably tar.bz2 or tar.gz).  Thanks, -Andy
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text: documentation updates to the how to for example would be nice.
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text: Can we get unit tests for the Named ranges in general?
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text:
Hi Libin, Can you send me this:  1 patch file with ALL deltas, 1 zip file with
all new files, including directories, the unit tests in all the correct packages.
Once I get that I'll commit it to the head and we'll go from htere.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
romal@vistaportal.com
text:
I have some new updates, for named ranges. that was made before u did the 
commit.
what should i do ?

Lets get them sync'd up so that we can just bring this puppy together.  I'd like
to see this in the next pure-development build.
creator: poi-support@buni.org

text: I applied this branch, please check it against the head.
creator: poi-support@buni.org
